column5: Updated, private & immaculate studio cottage in a charming neighborhood in central Austin. Private entrance & patio. Newly furnished! 15 min drive to downtown Austin. Our vintage 29' Airstream trailer with two twin beds is available for an additional fee.  To make your stay more comfortable, you'll find stocked toiletries, snacks, coffee and fixings, and fresh eggs from our pet chickens. Coffee maker, tea kettle, toaster, blender, hair dryer, clothing steamer & printer are at your disposal!
column8: Modern Cottage w/ Private Patio- Great location!
